alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Morgan; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 10:51AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Penny sized hail will impact portions of southwestern Shelby, northeastern Morgan and central Johnson Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1050 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Martinsville, or 22 miles south of Indianapolis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Franklin around 1105 AM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 84 and 97. Interstate 74 between mile markers 109 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
